title: Inside the Parker: Opening Day Edition! Rob's World Series Prediction, Players to Watch, Betting on the Bases
itunes:title: Inside the Parker: Opening Day Edition! Rob's World Series Prediction, Players to Watch, Betting on the Bases
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Opening Day is here, and Rob kicks things off by explaining why he's so excited about the 2021, if Francisco Lindor is making a mistake by passing up on over a reported $300 million guaranteed, and makes his 2021 World Series prediction! Also, Analytics Stat of the Day, JR Gamble's Players to Watch, Betting on the Bases, and Rob's Ode to Opening Day.

Guests: Former Cardinals Pitcher Daniel Ponce De Leon discusses his new book detailing his comeback from a career threatening line drive in a minor league game to making his big league debut, and previews he 2021 Cards. Author Cam Perron talks about his book that recounts his journey to developing relationships with some of the greatest Negro League stars.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
